title: Sekret
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Sekretet e mia me kon tjetër ai i ke nda
lines.translation: Secret e mia me con other ai i ke nda
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ti a i ke nda, ti a i ke nda
lines.translation: You are welcome, you are welcome
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: M'kan than ja ke nis mallit se spo duron mo, nuk po duron mo
lines.translation: M'kan than ja kes mallit se spo duron mo, nuk po duron mo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Jo me ty, ty, ty, ty, ty s'kisha dasht mu nda
lines.translation: Jo me ty, ty, ty, ty, ty s'kisha dasht mu nda
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty po du prap me t'pa
lines.translation: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty two prap me t'pa
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj loti o tu tha
lines.translation: And, and, and, and, and loti o tu tha
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthena mo
lines.translation: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthena mo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Jo me ty, ty, ty, ty, ty s'kisha dasht mu nda
lines.translation: Jo me ty, ty, ty, ty, ty s'kisha dasht mu nda
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty po du prap me t'pa
lines.translation: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty two prap me t'pa
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj loti o tu tha
lines.translation: And, and, and, and, and loti o tu tha
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthehna mo
lines.translation: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthehna mo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: A nga Kolumbia, a nga Kolumbia, a nga Kolumbia ti je
lines.translation: It's Colombia, it's Colombia, it's Colombia
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Je shumë dozë e fortë, je shumë dozë e fortë
lines.translation: It's too heavy, it's too heavy, it's too heavy
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: O bo, bo, bo, bo, sa m'ke deh
lines.translation: O bo, bo, bo, bo, sa m'ke deh
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Je fik e spo nezësh ma, hajde t'nezi pak
lines.translation: Je fik e spo nezësh ma, haide t'nezi pak
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Se veç unë e kom çelsin e zemrës tane
lines.translation: Se vej Æjn e kom celsin e korses tane
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: E di që jam çun haram, po sta bëj haram
lines.translation: And to say that it's already haram, now he's doing haram
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: A thu koha menjen po ta ndrron
lines.translation: A thu koha mejen po ta ndrron
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Koh-koht e fundit ja ka nis, nis
lines.translation: Koh-koht e fundt ja ka nis, nis
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Lluksi me t'pëlqy ty
lines.translation: I wish you well.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Edhe menja, menja tu ka rrit
lines.translation: And eat, eat, you have grown.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Gjynaf që u ndamë, gjynaf që u ndamë
lines.translation: Gjynaf qê u ndamë, gjynaf qê u ndamë
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Dhe shoqnia për ne u merzit
lines.translation: And the company for us was upset.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Sekretet e mia me kon tjetër ai i ke nda
lines.translation: Secret e mia me con other ai i ke nda
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ti a i ke nda, ti a i ke nda
lines.translation: You are welcome, you are welcome
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: M'kan than ja ke nis mallit
lines.translation: I can't believe that I've lost everything.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Se spo duron mo, nuk po duron mo
lines.translation: Se spo duron mo, nuk po duron mo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Jo me ty, ty, ty, ty, ty s'kisha dasht mu nda

lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.translation: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty two prap me t'pa
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj, kaj loti o tu tha
lines.translation: And, and, and, and, and loti o tu tha
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.translation: Ty, ty, ty, ty, ty two prap me t'pa
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.translation: And, and, and, and, and loti o tu tha
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthehna mo
lines.translation: Ku je, ku je, ti e vogla ime, a kthehna mo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Toke, toke, dorën hajde me mu toke
lines.translation: Toke, toke, durun haide me mu toke
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Mos na bo si qytetare unë malok e ti maloke
lines.translation: Mos na bo si ciudadare Æjn malok e ti maloke
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Që kur t'kam pa herën e parë, ma ka nis ni dhimbje koke
lines.translation: Qe kur t'kam pa khôten e éren, ma ka nis ni pärle koke
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Unë e di ti nuk je bar, po ti qenke kile droge
lines.translation: Una e di ti nuk je bar, po ti qenke kile drugo
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: A thu bon mem harru, bon mem harru
lines.translation: A thu bon mem harru, bon mem harru
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Bon mem harru, ti mu
lines.translation: Okay, wait a minute, you dumbass.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Trupin a bon me e lshu, bon me e lshu
lines.translation: Trupin a bon me e lshu, bon me e lshu
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Se je bo dru o ni-na-no
lines.translation: If it is good or bad,
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Jo, jo se ke pas vetëm njo
lines.translation: No, no, you only have one.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Gjithmonë i ke pas dy dashni
lines.translation: You always had two loves.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Njo për mu, njo për mu
lines.translation: Know me, know me
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Edhe njo për benzin
lines.translation: Also know about gasoline.
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Ja nisëm pahiri shoqe tash pa ty sun rri
lines.translation: Ja nisëm pahiri sofke tash pa ty sun rri
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.

lines.text: Hajde ma, hajde ma, veç për inat t'ex-it
lines.translation: Come on ma, come on ma, vech për inat t'ex-it
lines.grammar: Esperanto line; agglutinative morphology with -as/-is/-os tense endings.
